description: Three slug-like aliens are gathered on a couch, watching a film projector display an image of Earth on a screen. One of them comments on Earth as if it were a location they had previously visited. The alien uses the specific human idiom "greasy spoon" to describe the entire planet, reducing it to the level of a cheap, unappealing diner. This application of mundane, negative human slang to an entire world is highly absurd and ironic. It suggests the aliens have a distinctly unimpressed view of Earth based on their experience.
caption: “Oh, yeah. ... Now that place was really a greasy spoon!”
